text: Tangada la gi aloho i dono God, mai i lodo dono manawa, mo ana hagabaubau mo ono mahi, gei gi aloho i tangada dela i dono baahi be dono aloho i deia.’ Koia e hagalabagau go di hai hegau gi nia haganoho e lua aanei, i tadau hai dela e wanga dehuia tadau manu gi hongo di gowaa dudu tigidaumaha, mono tigidaumaha huogodoo ala e hai ang gi God.”12.33 1 Samuel 15.22; Pisalem 40.6-8; Isaiah 1.11-15; Hosea 6.6; Micah 6.6-8
